contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> Name = Kyuketsuki Hunter "D" Original Animation Soundtrack| Type = [[Soundtrack]]| Artist = [[Komuro Tetsuya]]| Cover = Vhdsd.gif | Released = 1986| Recorded = | Genre = | Length = 44:39| Label = [[Sony Music|Sony Music Japan]]| Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = '''''Vampire Hunter D''''' | Next album = ''[[Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust (soundtrack)|Vampire Hunter D:Bloodlust]]'' | }} '''''Vampire Hunter D''''' is a [[soundtrack]] album for the [[Vampire Hunter D|film of the same name]]. This was [[Tetsuya Komuro]]'s first solo work. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Name !! Length |- |1 || mamono-tachi no yoru / Night of Demons || 4:20 |- |2 || D fukkatsu / Resurrection of D || 2:09 |- |3 || D zetsumei / Death of D || 2:48 |- |4 || kyuuketsuki Lee hakushaku (toujou) / Earl Lee, the Vampire (Entrance) || 4:15 |- |5 || kizoku no konrei / Marriage of Nobles || 1:31 |- |6 || kyuuketsuki Lee hakushaku (shi) / Earl Lee, the Vampire (Death) || 7:40 |- |7 || D no teema (toujou) / Theme of D (Entrance) || 3:39 |- |8 || yakusoku (part I) / Promise (part I) || 3:07 |- |9 || D no teema (Doris no ai) / Theme of D (Doris's Love) || 3:22 |- |10 || Doris dakkai / Rescuing Doris || 5:19 |- |11 || D no teema (wakare) / Theme of D (Parting) || 3:26 |- |12 || yakusoku (part II) / Promise (part II) || 3:10 |} == References == * ''[http://yaacc.cjas.org/series/viewcd.cgi?dir=vampire-hunter-d&file=328H-59 Vampire Hunter "D" Original Animation Soundtrack ]''. [http://yaacc.cjas.org/ Yet another Anime CD Cyclopedia].
